news.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3
news.subtitle: No matter who you are or how you use web3, MetaMask allows you to do more safely on the decentralized internet

image.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3 Image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Web3 is catalyzing global change and as a MetaMask user, you're leading the charge. You are a trendsetter, trailblazer, creator, and builder, defining and shaping the culture and the systems that will define the next age of the decentralized internet.

Over the years, we‚Äôve built MetaMask to be a wallet without limits, designed for anyone who wants to do more with their crypto, engage with more dapps, and do it more safely. With MetaMask, there are no dead ends, no corner of web3 you can't explore, no dapp you can't connect with. And thanks to its best-in-class security, infinite extensibility, and powerful aggregation and curation in Portfolio, there's never been a better time for you to do more with MetaMask.

Let‚Äôs explore further.

MetaMask Makes You More Powerful in Web3

MetaMask is your gateway to the decentralized web, offering unmatched connectivity to thousands of dapps across networks and devices. It enables users to self-custody their assets, securely manage their digital authority and confidently sign transactions on the web, on the go or natively in a dapp.

MetaMask also brings the best of web3 to you. Instead of building ‚Äúone size fits all‚Äù tools, we aggregate the best web3 bridges, DEXs, onramp providers and staking protocols so you can choose the best tool for the job and manage your assets, without ever leaving the wallet.

Users can effortlessly buy, sell, swap, send, trade and stake tokens, knowing they‚Äôre getting the best rates from dozens of trusted providers.

Configurability, Privacy, and Extensibility: More Control with MetaMask

MetaMask is also pushing the boundaries of user control, offering unmatched configurability. We didn‚Äôt build a ‚Äútake it or leave it‚Äù wallet, instead shaping MetaMask as a customizable extension of you. MetaMask, allows users to set the terms for how applications can interact with their self-custodied data and digital assets.

Nowhere is this configurability more important than with our privacy features that allow users to control even the most basic functionality of the MetaMask wallet - from RPC configuration and token management to custom security warnings and IP tracking. The default settings built into MetaMask to protect users are all configurable, because there is no one size fits all approach to privacy.

Customize your privacy settings:

Extend to any network:

Set your terms:

Configurability is not limited to just what the MetaMask team has built. With MetaMask Snaps, users can tailor their experience, extend MetaMask to new networks and even build their own extensions and customizations, without permission - that's permissionless innovation.

Do Everything in Web3 More Securely with MetaMask

None of this matters if users do not feel secure exploring the frontiers of web3. MetaMask is committed to security and has become the battle-tested wallet trusted by millions of users executing their largest and most sensitive transactions.

We have powered billions of transactions across thousands of networks and scores of dapps, without security incidents caused by MetaMask and offer support to our customers 24/7 to ensure they safely navigate web3.

We are constantly investing in security, striking new partnerships like Blockaid's transaction security, adding new capabilities through the team at Wallet Guard, enabling users to build a modular wallet through Snaps and even building runtime protection through our Lavamoat security kernel. And with an open-source codebase and a transparent approach to privacy, you know exactly what you‚Äôre using with MetaMask.

MetaMask, an Extension of You in Web3 Now and Always

As the momentum of regulatory clarity and mainstream interest spurs innovation in our space, MetaMask will continue to be the powerful, configurable, secure wallet for those building and exploring the frontiers of the decentralized internet.

With powerful aggregators that put the best of tools in crypto at your fingertips and configurable settings that put you in control of your assets, data and digital authority, and a steadfast commitment to security and privacy preservation - MetaMask enables you to do more, safely, in web3.

And we‚Äôre just getting started.

This post is directed only at persons outside the UK and should not be acted on by UK consumers.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Layer3's mission is to help protocols grow and educate their ecosystems, while empowering people to explore and participate in diverse blockchain environments. Users¬†are encouraged to actively engage, earning incentives and completing meaningful interactions across different protocols. This turns learning into a tangible, rewarding journey. With MetaMask acting as a secure gateway, Layer3 makes blockchain exploration accessible rather than a daunting challenge.

Transforming blockchain education with Layer3

Web3, aka the decentralized web, represents more than just a technological shift. It's a fundamental reimagining of digital interactions. Unlike traditional centralized systems, web3 offers true ownership, transparency, and user empowerment. However, the complexity of blockchain technologies has created a significant barrier to entry, preventing many from experiencing these revolutionary benefits.

Making web3 accessible and rewarding

Layer3 solves this critical problem by creating a guided, incentive-driven pathway into web3. Instead of overwhelming users with technical details, Layer3 breaks down blockchain interactions into understandable campaigns. A learn-by-doing approach transforms exploration into an adventure, where each interaction becomes a learning opportunity and every completed campaign brings tangible rewards.

MetaMask's role in blockchain exploration

MetaMask has been instrumental in this journey, providing the secure infrastructure that allows users to seamlessly interact with Layer3's platform. Its powerful wallet enables users to explore web3 with confidence, traversing different blockchains with ease. Since launching, Layer3 has connected over 4 million wallets, demonstrating how a learn-by-doing approach can make web3 accessible and exciting for users across the globe.

Connect your MetaMask wallet, and begin your first Layer3 campaign today.

image.title: How to swap crypto with MetaMask
image.description: How to swap crypto with MetaMask

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Swapping crypto is fast, easy, and secure with MetaMask. You can choose from thousands of your favorite tokens across nine networks including Ethereum, Linea, Base, and Arbitrum. MetaMask Swaps also include gas fees right in your quotes, making swapping crypto as smooth as can be.

We've simplified cross-chain swapping too. Send&Swap lets you choose the token you want to spend and the token you want the other person to receive ‚Äî all in one move. As ever, safety is essential when it comes to your digital assets. So rest easy. MetaMask Swaps are powered by our razor-tight, industry-leading security.

Below, you'll find step-by-step guides showing you how to swap crypto with MetaMask.

Let‚Äôs get into it! ü¶ä

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Extension

  1. Open the MetaMask browser extension.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, and click the Swap button.
  3. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  4. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  6. A preferred quote will be loaded automatically. To select a different quote, click View all quotes.
  7. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! ü¶ä

How to swap crypto with MetaMask App

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask mobile app.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, located at the top of your screen. Example: Ethereum Mainnet.
  3. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  4. Tap Swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from by tapping the token name that appears under your wallet address. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Tap Swap to confirm.

Success! ü¶ä

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Portfolio

  1. Connect your MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Click Move crypto.
  3. Click Swap.
  4. Select the network you want to swap from in the dropdown menu. Example: Ethereum.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Click Get Quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! ü¶ä

Ready to start swapping crypto? If you‚Äôre on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide about swapping crypto.
